I've submitted the bug report : ee05d71c-a653-4c91-9094-42ea10210821 I've been able to produce the problem only with ebay.fr and ebay.com. The problem does also occur in troubleshooting mode. clearing the cache does not help.

title: Can't record audio in whatsapp web in Firefox
content: I am unable to record audio in whatsapp web in Firefox. After granting microphone permission, when the record button is clicked, it starts recording and immediately stops automatically. It works fine in other browsers, so I guessed it might be a problem with Firefox. I am using Fedora 34 and have Firefox 91.0. Thanks for the help!

title: Firefox Open Tab to Right
content:
When working I may have many, 20+ , tabs open. If I open a new tab it often gets totally lost. Yes it goes to the end of after Related current tab but this is not at all helpful. Sometimes the Related ones may be many and have to go hunting for it. I want to have have the old option of Opening Right Next to the Current tab. Not everyones choice but it needs to be an option.

The current setup can make using Firefox nearly unusable. Yes have gone into about:config page and changed the browser.tabs.insertRelatedAfterCurrent = true

It needs a browser.tabs.insertAfterCurrent = true No Related option

title: single out certain Google cookies to accept
content:
Firefox removes all cookies when I shut it down; that is the option I have chosen. I know I can opt out of this by allowing cookies for certain websites. 

I don't want to allow Google/Youtube cookies in this way: I don't want Google to come back the next time and continue to build their cookie cache; I want them to start with a "Google cookie free" browser.

But.....

This means I have to set my Google cookie settings every time I start my browser and visit any of the Google sites. This annoys me a lot.

Is it possible to single out certain cookies (e.g. the one with the Google cookie settings) that I want to keep, while I remove all the other Google cookies on shut down?

(Before you suggest: not using Google/Youtube is not an option).

Thanx,


Thom
creator: thom35

title: Firefox lag on new windows
content: My Firefox are lagging when i try to open a new windows on both normal and private browsing mode. So i went and refresh the Firefox and remove all the extension, the problem still persist. I also tried some other method suggested by other after my research, create a new account, turned off the hardware acceleration, set accessibility.force_disabled. None of them work, any clue on how can i fix this problem? The lag only happen on Firefox, i tried to typed on other software its fine, but i switch back to Firefox the input lag happen. Thanks and have a nice day!

title: Videos de Yotube se congelan por un momento pero el audio sigue.
content: Hola! Cuando estoy reproduciendo videos en YouTube me ocurre que el video se congela por un instante, pero el audio sigue, uego, el video retoma su reproducción y todo sigue como si nada hasta que sucede de nuevo. Es molesto y me ocurrió una vez ayer o antes de ayer, no recuerdo bien, pero lo solucioné borrando la caché y todo lo demás. El tema es que volvió a pasar ahora y, la verdad, se me ocurre que tiene que haber otra cosa que hacer. No me pasa con videos guardados en la PC o en otro navegador, copio el link del video y me voy a Edge y no pasa. Tengo una Dell 7567 con un i7 7700hq y una Nvidia Geforce 1050 ti. Tengo todo actualizado acorde al soporte de Dell. Saludos! Buen fin de semana. =D

title: 10+ years of browser history gone
content: firefox browser history disappeared after deleting appdata temp folder. windows 10 pc using ccleaner i "cleaned" the ...\appdata\local\temp\ folder all browser history has disappeared is gone. i have 4 firefox profiles and even the 2 profiles that i have not used in more than 8 months have been wiped clean. unfortunately the appdata branch is not part of any of my backup routines. i had always thought that the FF profiles contained all the browser history and was rather shocked to see all my curated history was gone. fortunately i did not loose the extensive bookmarks. why would browser history be stored only in a temp folder? any ideas??
